name: OCKWeekCalendarPageViewController
desc: A view controller that allows the user to page through adjacent weeks of task adherence content.

items.name: init(storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager, aggregator: OCKAdherenceAggregator)
items.desc: Creates a new week-long paging calendar view controller that contains a specific date.

items.name: var calendarDelegate: OCKWeekCalendarPageViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: An object that handles important events in a week calendar page view controller.

items.name: var dateInterval: DateInterval?
items.desc: The date interval the calendar displays.

items.name: var selectedDate: Date
items.desc: The date currently selected in the calendar.

items.name: func calendarView(UIView & OCKCalendarDisplayable, didSelectDate: Date, at: Int, sender: Any?)
items.desc: Notifies the delegate that a date has been selected in the calendar view.

items.name: func selectDate(Date, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Selects a specific date in the calendar view.

items.name: func pageViewController(UIPageViewController, didFinishAnimating: Bool, previousViewControllers: [UIViewController], transitionCompleted: Bool)
